document.full_text: asian shares fell on tuesday, with falling commodity prices dragging on mining stocks, while the aussie dollar eased after the central bank held interest rates and canada's currency rose as the ruling conservatives won a federal election.
document.title: asia stocks fall, canadian dollar gains
lines_and_colors: asian shares fell on tuesday, with falling commodity prices dragging on mining stocks, while the aussie dollar eased after the central bank held interest rates and canada's currency rose as the ruling conservatives won a federal election.
